archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Verify Outbound Party Payment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Verify that the party payment being prepared corresponds to payments that should be made to a party.

properties.value: Verify Outbound Party Payment verifies that the party payment being prepared corresponds to payments that should be made to a party. For example, that a refund check should be issued to a party based on an credit in the party's account or that the bills received from a party correspond to orders or other forms of purchases submitted to the party.
